title: EU to stress-test its trade defenses amid rising China, US threats
description: Brussels wants to make sure Europe isn’t caught off guard by unfair competition or geopolitical shocks — and is preparing to upgrade its defenses.
content: For now, the 3 billion will be mobilized from both EU funds and from the European Investment Bank, which said earlier this year it would make 2 billion of financing available for critical mineral inv… [+1286 chars]
